course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Photography
course.description: This course provides an overview of the various forms of Photography, explores the relationship between visual communication and art. The course will examine the collaborative process between light and graphic, concepts and skills. The increasing influences of images and trends from visual media will also be discussed.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in LANG 1401 OR LANG 1402 OR LANG 1403 OR LANG 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: processing
reviews.title: 速離 讀過最垃圾嘅course
reviews.comment_content:
要有部數碼相機
冇乜特別 一開始講下點用相機
之後拎佢啲作品出嚟J下
其實都唔係靚得去邊 走堂算啦

有兩次Outing 去中大同埋大埔鐵路博物館 可以唔去
佢都唔介意attendance 你最尾一兩堂一次過take返晒都ok
reviews.comment_teaching:
同乜都冇教冇分別
光圈快門iso 之類嘅關係 都冇乜點講
新手靠佢就死得

淨係會講廣東話
Present會搞好耐 會隨便打斷你 講野好mean
當你係攝影師咁judge

唔少人都識影相
見啲傻仔拎部菲林 老爺機俾人屈得好慘
reviews.comment_grading:
Assignment, present, project咩分都唔會同你講
到最後淨係得個grade

全部都係印象分
佢記得你嘅話應該唔會差得去邊
係女同學嘅話仲好 條狗公Birdy最鍾意同女吹水
reviews.comment_workload:
好撚大
要交兩次作品 仲要寫essay
平時冇影開相嘅話 每次都要用一兩日出街影

reviews.author: JNC
reviews.title: DO NOT TAKE ANY COURSE of this instructor!!!!!!!!!! 'Photography' is FAKE
reviews.comment_content:
RUBBISH.
Poorly organized content, basically no content.

I know you may expect that you can:
- know about the camera
- how to set the camera to achieve what you want
- how to take a pretty photograph
- appreciate the beauty of photography
- chill

YOU WON'T GET ANY OF THE ABOVE!!!!
reviews.comment_teaching:
He is not enabling you to do anything. He does NOT add value to anything. Taking his classes is absolutely a waste of time.

More importantly, he has no respect for the students. When the students are presenting, he often interrupts with random useless comments and he does not listen to what the students have presented.

I believe the situation is the same for his other courses like Video art, which has even more workload
reviews.comment_grading:
HE DID NOT RELEASE ANY SCORE!
So you have no idea about whether the grade you get is reasonable or not. For your own good YOU MUST DO GRADE CHECKING.

It took me 3 weeks of emailing back and forth with him & his boss and later I got 2 grade points increase because of his mistake.

He is very unprofessional and you can definitely expect many mistakes in the grading process so don't trust him!!!!
reviews.comment_workload:
VERY HEAVY as a common core. You even have to borrow/buy your own camera.

70% are group projects (1MT+1final)
20% individual research
10% attendance

For each project, you have to spend at least 2 full days taking photos, then time to edit and making powerpoints and researching. And you have two projects like this

reviews.author: hatsunemiku
reviews.title: Chill professor and also ur grade
reviews.comment_content:
The syllabus is very unclear and the assignment's instructions are very poor delivered.
Contents are barely relevant to photography, it has outing but he teaches nothing, just telling us to take photos, thats all.

Ah he also told us we can borrow a camera from school's library but it is only available for staff :)
reviews.comment_teaching: His teaching using Cantonese most of the times so that the international students won't understand. PowerPoint slides are messy and poor organised. His lecturers are really boring like 拖時間. He also got mad at someone didn't have a group member although they didn't want to.
reviews.comment_grading:
我派好少A range架咋
-- Chu Shun (2023)
reviews.comment_workload:
Very heavy and very intensive for a summer course
Having a midterm project right after the add drop period ends
